w16cs350.controller.timing

Class Clock

  • java.lang.Object
    • w16cs350.controller.timing.Clock

  • public class Clock
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines an observer-based singleton clock for all system timing.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Clock getInstance()
        Gets the singleton instance of this clock. The default zzz is . The clock is initially disabled.
        Returns:
        this instance

      • activate

        public void activate()
        zzz

      • forceUpdate

        public void forceUpdate()
        Forces a manual clock tick and updates all registered listeners. This is normally called automatically by the clock timer thread, but for internal testing only, it may be called manually to trigger the clock on demand. Disable the clock first with isEnabled(boolean). zzz

      • setTicksPerRealSecond

        public void setTicksPerRealSecond(int ticksPerRealSecond)
        Sets the number of system clock ticks to issue per real-time second.
        Parameters:
        ticksPerRealSecond - - the number of system clock ticks to issue per real-time zzz simulation second; the minimum is 1, the maximum is 1000 zzz
